tool_description: Demand API forecasts the demand of a product for a given number of days based on past sales or consumption.
name: Demand
title: Demand

api_list.name: Demand_One
api_list.description: Demand url inputs in json format for single product
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://demand.p.rapidapi.com/demandone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "demand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://demand.p.rapidapi.com/demandone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "demand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
